article.title: DRS Technologies Receives $35 Million Contract From Raytheon for PTIs
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: DRS Technologies Incorporated has received a new contract for $35.2 million for production of Phalanx Thermal Imagers (PTIs) and spares. The contract has been awarded by Raytheon Missile Systems, a prime contractor to the U.S. Navy for the Phalanx Close-in Weapon System program.
